We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AdvanceDeclineVolumeRatio _advr;
// In Initialize()
_advr = ADVR(symbols);

// In OnData()
if (_advr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADVR Current", _advr.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.advr = self.ADVR(symbols)

# In OnData()
if self.advr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADVR Current", self.advr.Current);
